song.englishname: Medley: Only Be Grace/To Him Who Sits on the Throne/You Are Holy

english.segment1: Only by grace can we enter. Only by grace can we stand. Not by our human endeavor. But by the blood of the Lamb
english.segment2: Into Your presence You call us. Call us to come. Into Your presence You draw us. And now by Your grace we come. We come. Now by Your grace we come
english.segment3: Lord, if You mark our transgressions. Who would stand?. But thanks to Your grace. We are cleansed by the blood of the Lamb
english.segment4: Only by grace can we enter. And now by Your grace we come. We come. Now by Your grace we come
english.segment5: To Him who sits on the throne. And unto the Lamb. To Him who sits on the throne. And unto the Lamb. Be blessing and honor. And glory and power forever. Be blessing and honor. And glory and power forever
english.segment6: You are Holy. Oh, Lord, so Holy. You are Holy. Oh, Lord, so Holy
english.segment7: What a privilege and an honor. To worship at Your throne. To be caught into Your presence. As Your own
english.segment8: You are Holy. Oh, Lord, so Holy. You are worthy. Oh, Lord, so worthy. You are faithful. Oh, Lord, so faithful
english.segment9: Be blessing and honor. And glory and power forever. Be blessing and honor. And glory and power forever..
